title: unniDam VishvAsam
sahitya:
unniDam vishvAsam uLLadoru dAsanAgum ennai AtkoLLayyA vAsanE


anupallavi

  ponnambala vAsanum viNNulaga vAsigaLum pOTrap-pugazh vIsum Atral mighu murugEsA


caraNam    unnaDi sErndiDa ODi vandu kUDiDum anbar sOrndiDAdu aruL IndiDuvOnE
innaluTrumenmEl tunbam uTru vADum enniDam iniyEnum un manam uruga vENum
